title: Zucchini and Squash Storage Guide

items.name: Whole (refrigerator)
items.details: Lasts about 1-2 weeks if stored unwashed in a plastic or paper bag in the crisper drawer.

items.name: Cut or cooked (refrigerator)
items.details: Lasts only 3-4 days in an airtight container.

items.name: Blanched and frozen
items.details: Lasts 8-12 months in the freezer. Blanch before freezing for best results.

notes: Store unwashed to prevent premature spoilage. Use a plastic or paper bag in the crisper drawer for best results with whole zucchini and squash.
